description: Numbers divisible both by their individual digits and by the sum of their digits.
comments: No zero digits permitted. [Harvey P. Dale, Dec 18 2011]
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: ddQ[n_]:=Module[{idn=IntegerDigits[n]},!MemberQ[idn,0] && Divisible[ n,Total[idn]]&&And@@Divisible[n,idn]]; Select[Range[1400],ddQ] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 18 2011 *)
prog: (Haskell)a051004 n = a051004_list !! (n-1)a051004_list =  [x | x <- a005349_list,                     x == head (dropWhile (< x) a034838_list)]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 03 2012
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
